role_dependencies: Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that installs Microsoft Teams on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: This repository contains an Ansible role that installs Microsoft Teams on nearly any platform. Microsoft Teams is a proprietary business communication platform developed by Microsoft, as part of the Microsoft 365 family of products. Teams primarily competes with the similar service Slack, offering workspace chat and videoconferencing, file storage, and application integration.
